subject: CALL FOR PAPERS: 19th IEEE International Symposium on Signal Processing and Information Technology (ISSPIT 2019)
body:
IEEE eNotice





















      We are pleased to invite you to 19th IEEE International Symposium on 
	  Signal Processing and Information Technology (ISSPIT 2019).



	  The symposium is sponsored by IEEE Signal Processing Society and IEEE 
	  Computer Society and will be held at Ajman University, Ajman (20 minutes 
	  driving from Dubai), UAE on 10-12 December 2019. Papers presented in 
	  ISSPIT 2019 will be submitted for publication in the Proceedings of IEEE 
	  ISSPIT 2019, IEEE Xplore digital library and they are Scopus Indexed.



	  Authors are invited to submit papers describing original, previously 
	  unpublished work, not currently under review by another conference, 
	  workshop, or a journal. Full papers (up to 6 camera-ready two-column pages 
	  in IEEE format) should present novel perspectives within the general scope 
	  of the conference.



	  For information and registration, please visit the following link:



	  http://www.isspit.org/isspit/2019/



	  Important dates:

	  o Paper submission deadline: 30 September 2019.

	  o Notification of acceptance: 30 October 2019.

	  o Final paper (camera ready): 15 November 2019.



	  For any further information, contact a.tawfik@ajman.ac.ae
















IEEE Computer Society: https://computer.org/
